title: "AI Search Art"
content:
ðŸ‘‹ Welcome to our website featuring an abstract illustration of an AI-powered search engine! Our minimalist and modern design is set against a gradient background that adds depth and dimension to the artwork.

Our website is dedicated to showcasing the beauty of artificial intelligence through art. We believe that AI has the potential to revolutionize the world, and we want to celebrate its power and potential through visual representation.

Whether you're an AI enthusiast or simply appreciate stunning artwork, our website has something for everyone. Browse our collection of wallpapers, each one featuring a unique interpretation of an AI-powered search engine. From bold and colorful designs to more subtle and understated illustrations, there's a wallpaper to suit every taste.

So why not add some AI-inspired art to your desktop or mobile device? Download one of our wallpapers today and let the power of artificial intelligence inspire you every day!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper featuring an abstract illustration of an AI-powered search engine, with a minimalist and modern design, set against a gradient background."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
